attributes.action: Re-open Brawdy Airfield in Pembrokshire as a Civil Airfield
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The former RAF Airfield at Brawdy was turned into an army barracks. I would like to see the site re-opened as a Civil Airfield as it has a lot of history and an Airfield would be very popular in the local area. It would also boost the local econony and boost tourism.
